column3: Latest;Svay Rieng:  Bavet City Deputy Inspector Keo Chetra
column5: and the son of Bavet police inspector Keo Kongat
column6: has been remanded in custody by a court notice
column7: following a ------fatal shooting of a 38 year old woman------ in a Bavet restaurant on December 20th.------The victim later died in Vietnam following a gun shot to her head. She leaves behind a young daughter.------The motive for the murder is being hotly speculated on social media.
